00025 if (checkUserAgent()==0){
00026         print showAbout();
00027 } else {
00028         require_once("./engine/db.php");
00029 
00030         $DB = new DB();
00031 
00033         $action = (int)$_POST['action'];
00034                  
00035         switch ($action){
00036                 case 1:
00038                         print $DB->exportAppByName($_POST['search'], $_POST['page']);
00039                 break;
00040                 case 3:
00042                         print $DB->exportAppById($_POST['appid']);
00043                 break;
00044                 case 4:
00046                         print $DB->exportTestResults($_POST['appid'], $_POST['verid'], $_POST['testid']);
00047                 break;
00048                 case 5:
00050                         print $DB->exportCategory($_POST['catid']);               
00051                 break;
00052                 default:
00054                         print showAbout();
00055                 break;
